# Server Rules This is a Delta-V server. You must be at least 18 years of age to play on this server. By connecting to this server, you agree to our privacy policy found at [color=#808080]https://discord.gg/deltav[/color]
[color=#ffDD00]This is an [textlink="Auteur Roleplaying (ARP) server." link="DeltaVARP"] [/color] This means that we expect you to roleplay and engage in the round as a character at all times. Both Crew and Antagonists should be focused on authoring the narrative of the round. Players are given broad freedom to be creative, so long as they are roleplaying in good faith.
All of our rules are written to align with our [textlink="Mission Statement" link="DeltaVMS"]. Many rules are designed to require roleplay, and not all rules are intuitive. Please take the time to read and understand the rules before you play so that you aren't surprised. Most of our rules will be met with a warning, followed by an appeal-only ban. Game admins will treat you as if you have read the rules, even if you have not. If you have any questions about these rules, please use the admin help menu by hitting F1 in-game or clicking the "AHelp" button in the lobby, or by making a post in the "Rules Clarification" forum at [color=#808080]https://discord.gg/deltav[/color]
## Community Rules These rules apply at all times, including between rounds. - [textlink="0. Admins can exercise discretion in the enforcement of rules." link="DeltaVRule0"] - [textlink="A1. ## Silicon Rules For players who are silicons, these Silicon Rules override all roleplay rules if there is any conflict. Silicon Rules do not override core rules. You are only silicon if the game clearly and explicitly tells you that you are a silicon. - [textlink="S1. Your silicon laws are rules" link="DeltaVRuleS1"] - [textlink="S2.
